title: EventBridge Custom Event
description: Submit a custom event to EventBridge from a Step Function
usecase: Publish custom events from a Step Function to be consumed by other services.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This workflow demonstrates how to use Step Functions to send a custom event to an Event Bridge bus.  The bus contains a rule which matches the event pattern emitted by the Step Function.
The targets (SNS, Lambda, and SQS) will subsequently process the emitted event.

testing.headline: Testing
text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
Ensure your AWS credentials and profile are in place
